name: Fitness Center
text: The fitness center at Split Rock Resort provides a variety of equipment to help work away the day‘s pressures, including treadmills, lifecycles, elliptical cross trainers, steppers, rowers, universal weight stations, free weights and flat screen TVs. The fitness center also offers special classes including water aerobics. Memberships are available to the public. Open Sunday – Thursday from 7:00am-10:00pm and Friday – Saturday from 7:00am-11:00pm.
